channel.title: CVE Feed for Schoolbox Pty Ltd -- Schoolbox
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schoolbox Pty Ltd -- Schoolbox

item.title: CVE-2022-3059|2024-08-03T01:00:10.315Z -- schoolbox%20pty%20ltd -- schoolbox
item.description: The application was vulnerable to multiple instances of SQL injection (authenticated and unauthenticated) through a vulnerable parameter. Due to the stacked query support, complex SQL commands could be crafted and injected into the vulnerable parameter and using a sleep based inferential SQL injection it was possible to extract data from the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-28096|2024-06-04T18:03:45.570Z -- schoolbox%20pty%20ltd -- schoolbox
item.description: Class functionality in Schoolbox application before version 23.1.3 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting allowing authenticated attacker to perform security actions in the context of the affected users.

item.title: CVE-2024-28097|2024-03-07T03:22:15.658Z -- schoolbox%20pty%20ltd -- schoolbox
item.description: Calendar functionality in Schoolbox application before version 23.1.3 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting allowing authenticated attacker to perform security actions in the context of the affected users.

item.title: CVE-2024-28094|2024-06-04T18:03:28.556Z -- schoolbox%20pty%20ltd -- schoolbox
item.description: Chat functionality in Schoolbox application before version 23.1.3 is vulnerable to blind SQL Injection enabling the authenticated attackers to read, modify, and delete database records.

item.title: CVE-2024-28095|2024-06-04T18:03:21.542Z -- schoolbox%20pty%20ltd -- schoolbox
item.description: News functionality in Schoolbox application before version 23.1.3 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting allowing authenticated attacker to perform security actions in the context of the affected users.
